text:
I can publish a CM without error/warnings.
After adding it to a template I got 4 empty errors:
`1. Error: Syntax error in ""`
 and can't publish the template
Can someone check this?
Hi Gonzalo! Can you please provide a link to the module and the template?
sure, thanks for checking
what are some tricks or hacks people use to get around the fact that custom modules can’t have smart rules in the new design manager?
What specifically are you trying to replicate? You can probably do almost everything in HubL
basically to show unique content based on the list a user is on
the other use case would be by what county the user is in
you could use the {{contact}} object in HubL to get the inferred IPs / country information
as for lists, haven't dug deep enough into the contact object but there's a LOT of stuff on it that you can use - List membership _may_ be one of them but we'd need <@U6GNQ7JBU> to chime in perhaps?
<@U22PJPGK0> may know if list membership is available somewhere in a HubL object (like {{contact}} ) as well
I think `{{ content.list_memberships }}` will give you a list of list ids
Thanks Jeff

I’m not able to edit any HTML modules inside of global groups - I get the following error in the console, and it re-fires everytime I try to interact with the group after first clicking Edit HTML Source.

The module edit area just shows a blank gray screen and I need to reload the page to get anything with the module to reload. Haven’t touched this site in about a week but know the same areas were working at that point
not sure which HS devs work with DM2.0 - <@U7P6G42AX> or <@U22PJPGK0> maybe?
I've gotten a couple of reports of that in custom HubL modules
thanks for the response, Ian - any resolution you’ve seen come about with them? Or is just something that you’ve seen today/past couple of days popping up?
Just something another dev on our team ran into today
I haven't really looked into it beyond that, but yeah it's not just you
ah got ya, that’s good to know. I just checked two other portals, one DM1 and one DM2, and ran into on the DM2 portal but not DM1. Wondering if it’s across all DM2's
I just checked myself, and looks like the same error in my js console
So, same thing
Thanks for reporting. We are currently working on a fix.
Thanks Shawn
